sentence.text: Mutations in SLC4A11, a Na<sup>+</sup> dependent OH<sup>-</sup> transporter, cause congenital hereditary endothelial dystrophy (phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain) and Fuchs' endothelial corneal dystrophy (FECD), the two most common forms of endothelial degeneration.

entity.text: phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain
